players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Diana was found dead last night. We need to be very careful today and try to figure out who among Bob, Charlie, and me might be the mafia."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and found out for sure. We should vote to arrest him today to protect the town."
You: "Bob, your claim to have investigated Charlie is suspicious since only the detective can investigate, and you haven't said you're the detective. Can you prove it?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Diana was found dead last night. We need to be very careful today and try to figure out who among Bob, Charlie, and me might be the mafia."
You: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and found out for sure. We should vote to arrest him today to protect the town."
Alice: "Bob, your claim to have investigated Charlie is suspicious since only the detective can investigate, and you haven't said you're the detective. Can you prove it?"

players.name: Charlie
memory: Alice: "Diana was found dead last night. We need to be very careful today and try to figure out who among Bob, Charlie, and me might be the mafia."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and found out for sure. We should vote to arrest him today to protect the town."
Alice: "Bob, your claim to have investigated Charlie is suspicious since only the detective can investigate, and you haven't said you're the detective. Can you prove it?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
